snippet.title: "EverQuest: The Scars of Velious" Trailer
snippet.description:
In 1996, Sony purchased the rights to "Everquest," a 3d MMORPG conceived of and designed by Brad McQuaid, Steve Clover, & Bill Trost.

Sony's John Smedley then hired the trio to oversee and lead the development of the game, working as part of 989 Studios.

Everquest's final development was spun-off to a new Sony Online Entertainment game studio, "Verant Interactive," where Brad & his team had more freedom to develop EQ using the game dev philosophy McQuaid coined, "the Vision."



NOTICE:
All copyrights, trademarks, and credits belong to their respective owners. This video was uploaded as an attempt to digitally archive this game's trailer for educational and historical purposes.
